text:
[Verse]
Woke up with a smile today
Sunflowers in my window
Dancing in the morning rays
In a world of simple glow

[Verse 2]
Raindrops start to kiss the earth
Glistening on the leaves
Colors of a new rebirth
Nature's gentle weave

[Chorus]
Sunflowers and rain
Joy and little pain
Sunflowers and rain
We're dancing once again

[Verse 3]
Footsteps in the morning dew
Chasing dreams that never fade
Laughter in the skies so blue
Memories we've made

[Chorus]
Sunflowers and rain
Joy and little pain
Sunflowers and rain
We're dancing once again

[Bridge]
Hold my hand let's take a flight
Through fields of yellow light
In this moment you and I
Underneath the open sky
title: Sunflowers and Rain
